name: Coin Blitz
description: Coin Blitz is a casual coin-push arcade cabinet experience, with a pachinko-style backboard element. Build up layers of coins and try to get specialized effects in the best locations to dump coins into your bank. Stack your prizes over time for more powerful effects and level up your coins! Which prizes will you choose, and how quickly will you accumulate riches? Focus on a few powerful effects or dabble in a little bit of everything, the choice is yours.
